title: Settings
clear_data_warning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
addons_description: Manage and install addons to extend functionality
general_page_description: Manage the general application settings and preferences.
auto_update_description: When enabled, Wealthfolio will automatically check for updates when the application starts. You can still manually check for updates from the Help menu.
auto_update_success_description: Auto-update settings have been saved successfully.
auto_update_error_description: Failed to update auto-update settings. Please try again.
exchange_rates_description: Manage exchange rates for currencies in your portfolio.
exchange_rates_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this exchange rate?
exchange_rates_add_description: Add a new exchange rate to the system.
exchange_rates_rate_positive: Rate must be a valid positive number.
exchange_rates_rate_non_negative: Rate must be a non-negative number.
exchange_rates_manual_only: Only manual rates can be edited.
appearance_description: Customize the appearance of the application.
appearance_font_description: Choose the font family used throughout the interface.
appearance_theme_description: Select your preferred theme for the application.
appearance_menu_bar_description: Toggle to display the application menu bar.
accounts_description: Manage your investment and saving accounts.
accounts_empty_description: You don't have any account yet. Start adding your investment accounts.
accounts_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this account and related activities?
accounts_form_add_description: Add an investment account to track.
accounts_form_type_sheet_description: Choose the account type that best matches.
goals_description: Manage your investment and saving goals.
goals_allocations_description: Click on a cell to specify the percentage of each account's allocation to your goals.
goals_empty_description: You don't have any goals yet. Start adding your investment goals.
goals_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this goal and related activities?
goals_form_add_description: Add an investment goal to track.
limits_empty_description: You don't have any contribution limits for the current year. Start adding your contribution limits.
limits_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this contribution limit?
limits_form_group_name_description: Name of the contribution limit group
limits_form_date_description: Dates default to January 1st through December 31st of the selected year
market_data_description: Manage settings for your market data providers.
market_data_refetch_confirm_message: This will refetch all market data history and recalculate the portfolio.
market_data_provider_key_set_message: An API key is set. Enter a new key to update, or leave blank and save to clear the key.
market_data_provider_key_not_set_message: No API key set. Enter a key and save.
market_data_provider_priority_descriptio: Lower number means higher priority (e.g., 1 is higher than 10).
market_data_provider_config_required_mes: This provider requires an API key to function properly. Configure the API key in the settings below to start fetching market data.
market_data_no_providers: No market data providers configured. This might be an initialization issue.
market_data_import_description: Upload CSV files to backfill market data for your portfolio.
addons_description: Install and manage add-ons to extend Wealthfolio's functionality.
addons_info_description: Add-ons let you extend Wealthfolio with new features, custom analytics, and additional functionality to enhance your financial management experience.
addons_security_message: Only install add-ons from trusted sources. Add-ons have access to your application data.
addons_check_updates_description: Check all installed add-ons for available updates from their sources.
addons_install_from_file_description: Install an add-on from a local ZIP file. Only install add-ons from trusted sources.
addons_empty_description: Get started by installing your first add-on to extend Wealthfolio's functionality.
addons_remove_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to remove {name}?
addons_remove_confirm_description: This action cannot be undone. The addon will be completely removed from your system.
addons_rating_success: Your rating has been submitted successfully.
addons_install_cancelled_description: Addon installation was cancelled by user.
export_description: Export your financial data and manage database backups with advanced options.
export_section_description: Export specific data types in various formats for analysis or external use.
export_format_json_description: Structured data for easy programmatic access
export_type_portfolio_history_descriptio: Your portfolio's performance over time, including valuations, gains, and cash flow activities.
export_type_full_database_description: Complete database backup with WAL/SHM files - choose your backup location
backup_description: Create complete database backups and restore from previous backups.
backup_create_description: Create a complete backup of your database including WAL and SHM files. Choose your backup location.
backup_restore_description: Restore your database from a previous backup file. This will replace all current data. Then restart the application to apply changes.
backup_note_1: Backup includes WAL and SHM files for complete data integrity
backup_note_2: Restore will replace ALL current data with backup data
backup_note_3: A pre-restore backup is automatically created before restoration
backup_note_4: You will be prompted to restart the application after restoration
about_tagline: A beautiful, simple, and secure personal finance and investment tracker that helps you take control of your wealth.
about_support_message: Have questions or found a bug? Please email us at
quote_import_section_description: Import historical market data from CSV files to fill gaps in your portfolio data
quote_import_form_description: Choose a CSV file containing historical quote data to import
quote_import_overwrite: Overwrite existing quotes with the same symbol and date
quote_import_summary_description: Review the validation results before proceeding with the import
quote_preview_description: Review the first {count} rows of your CSV data
quote_help_intro: Import historical market data from CSV files to fill gaps in your portfolio data for assets where external data sources only provide recent quotes.
quote_help_step_1: Prepare your CSV file with OHLCV data format
quote_help_step_2: Upload and validate your CSV file
quote_help_step_3: Review validation results and sample data
quote_help_step_4: Import quotes with optional duplicate handling
quote_help_tip_text: Use this feature when external data providers only have quotes from recent years, but you have transaction history from earlier periods.
quote_help_required_text: Only symbol and close price are required. Open, high, low, volume, and currency are optional but recommended for complete data.
quote_help_auto_text: Multiple date formats are supported (YYYY-MM-DD, DD/MM/YYYY, MM/DD/YYYY). Currency symbols are automatically handled.
quote_help_format_comment_2: # Optional: open, high, low, volume, currency
quote_help_validation_symbol: Symbol: Must be a valid ticker symbol
quote_help_validation_date: Date: Must be a valid date (multiple formats supported)
quote_help_validation_prices: Prices: Must be valid decimal numbers
quote_help_validation_duplicates: Duplicates: Existing quotes can be overwritten or skipped
quote_help_important_text: Large imports may take time. The system will show progress and handle errors gracefully.
addon_store_no_match: No addons match your search for "{query}". Try different keywords or clear your search.
addon_store_no_filters: No addons match your current filters. Try adjusting your filters or refreshing the store.
addon_permission_minimal: This addon has minimal access to your data.
addon_permission_moderate: This addon has moderate access to your financial data.
addon_permission_extensive: This addon has extensive access to sensitive financial data.
addon_update_no_url: No download URL available for this update.
addon_update_breaking_message: This update includes breaking changes that may affect addon functionality. Please review the release notes carefully before updating.
addon_update_critical_message: This is a critical security update. We strongly recommend updating as soon as possible.
addon_card_share_experience: Share your experience with other users
addon_rating_description: Share your experience with this addon to help other users.
addon_rating_question: How would you rate this addon?
addon_rating_placeholder: Share your thoughts about this addon...
